EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +8 hit points and 3 Magical Resistance Rating. For every additional core in the tree gain 16 hit points and 3 more Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Nature's Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Defensive Combat Stance: +8 Physical and Magical Resistance Rating. Cannot be used with other defensive stances, but can be used while raging. Cooldown: 6 seconds.

Stance.Name: Nature's Defense
Stance.Description: Defensive Combat Stance: +8 PRR and MRR. Cannot be used with other defensive stances, but can be used while raging. Cooldown: 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Magical Beast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
While in animal form the penalty on your spell cooldowns is reduced from 2.5 to 2.0. This benefit does not stack with the Nature's Warrior versions of this ability.
Grants Heavy Armor Proficiency

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Big Claws
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds Great Maul to your spell book: Requires Bear form: Activate to do an Innate Attack: Deals 3[W] with +1 bonus to critical threat and damage, and the target you strike must make a Fortitude save or be stunned for 6 seconds, DC: 13 + Max(Str, Wis) mod + Tactical bonuses. SP Cost: 3 Cooldown: 12 seconds. Shares a cooldown with Maul.

DC.Name: Nature's Protector: Big Claws
DC.Description: Innate Attack: Deals 3[W] with +1 bonus to critical threat and damage, and the target you strike must make a Fortitude save or be stunned for 6 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Big Bear
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The Tremor spell now has a 20% chance to restore 1 charge of Barbarian Rage. Grants a 5% combat style attack speed bonus in Bear forms.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: The Great Bear
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants a 10% combat style attack speed bonus in Bear forms. +2 Strength and Constitution. While in animal form your spell cooldowns are only increased by 1.5 down from 2. This effect does not stack with Nature's Warrior.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Rage of the Beast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Grants you the ability to Rage like a Barbarian. Activate to Rage, gaining +4 Strength and Constitution, +2 Will Saves and -2 Armor Class. Lasts 30 + (6 x Con Modifier) seconds. You are fatigued when this effect ends. You cannot cast spells while raging. [1/2/3] Charges per rest. Effects that modify Barbarian rage apply to this enhancement. Also grants the Dismiss Rage Feat.

Stance.Name: Rage
Stance.Description: Grants you the ability to rage like a Barbarian. Activate to rage, gaining +4 Strength and Constitution, +2 Will Saves and -2 Armor Class. Lasts 30 + (6 x Con Modifier) seconds. You are fatigued when this effect ends. You cannot cast spells while raging. [1/2/3] Charges per rest. Effects that modify Barbarian rage apply to this enhancement. Also grants the Dismiss Rage Feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Bloody Claws
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every time you use Maul you gain one stack of Killer Instincts: +1 to damage for 15 seconds. Max stack size: [1/2/3]

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Improved Nature's Defense I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between: Enchanted Defense, Fierce Defense and Grizzled Defense.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchanted Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in the Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[4/8/12] Competence bonus to PRR and MRR.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fierce Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[150/300/450]% Competence bonus to melee threat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Grizzled Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[1/2/3] sacred bonus to all saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Fey's Blessing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a +[2/4/6] bonus to Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Animal Brutality
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a +[1/2/3] skill bonus to Intimidate, Swim and Jump. Rank 3 grants +1 to hit and damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Primal Beast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While using Barbarian Rage in animal form you gain +[5/10/15] Melee Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Sharp Claws
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Shred attack now grants you one stack of Killer Instinct: +1 to damage for 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Improved Nature's Defense II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a different stance to that chosen in tier1, between: Enchanted Defense, Fierce Defense and Grizzled Defense.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchanted Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in the Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[4/8/12] Competence bonus to PRR and MRR.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fierce Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[150/300/450]% Competence bonus to melee threat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Grizzled Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[1/2/3] sacred bonus to all saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Thick Hide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Natural Armor Bonus

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Action Boost: Beast at Bay
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain an action boost for [5/10/15] Armor Class and [7/14/21] Magical Resistance Rating for 20 seconds. Consumes one action boost.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Enduring Beast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
While using Barbarian Rage in animal form, you gain +[10/20/30] Positive Healing Amplification and +[1/2/3] Strength.
Grants [1/2/3] additional uses of Rage per rest.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Savage Roar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Using the Roar spell with 1 stack of Killer Instincts active now triggers a burst of 1..3 Sonic damage per Druid level you have. Scales with melee power. If you have 2 stacks it also stuns. At 3 stacks the damage is increased to 5..10 per Druid level and also applies the stun. Fortitude save negatives stun.
DC: 10 + 1/2 Druid Level + Max(Str, Wis) mod + Stun bonuses.
Casting Roar clears all stacks of Killer Instinct.

DC.Name: Nature's Protector: Savage Roar
DC.Description: Using the Roar spell with 1 stack of Killer Instincts active now triggers a burst of 1..3 Sonic damage per Druid level you have. Scales with melee power. If you have 2 stacks it also stuns. At 3 stacks the damage is increased to 5..10 per Druid level and also applies the stun.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Improved Nature's Defense III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose the final stance not chosen at tiers 1 and 2, between: Enchanted Defense, Fierce Defense and Grizzled Defense.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Enchanted Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in the Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[4/8/12] Competence bonus to PRR and MRR.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fierce Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[150/300%/450]% Competence bonus to melee threat.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Grizzled Defense
EnhancementSelection.Description: While in Nature's Defense stance you gain a +[1/2/3] sacred bonus to all saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Greater Nature's Defense I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between: Ursa's Heart, Ursa's Spirit and Ursa's Will.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[15/20/25]% competence bonus to max hit points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Spirit
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[2/4/6] competence bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Will
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield/medium/heavy armor equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[3/6/9] sacred bonus to MRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Constitution and Strength

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Undying Beast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While using Barbarian Rage in animal form you gain immunity to energy drain and death effects.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Beast Awakened
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can now cast Druidic magic while raging.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Greater Nature's Defense II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose a different stance to that chosen in tier1, between: Ursa's Heart, Ursa's Spirit and Ursa's Will.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[15/20/25]% competence bonus to max hit points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Spirit
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[2/4/6] competence bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Will
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield/medium/heavy armor equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[3/6/9] sacred bonus to MRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between wither Constitution or Strength.

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Constitution
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Constitution

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Strength
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Strength

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Beast Unleashed
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While using Barbarian Rage in animal form, you gain an additional +25 Melee Power. If you are in any Bear form you also gain a +15% bonus to Armor Class and 50% increase to Melee Threat Generation.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Bear Charge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +20% Damage +1 Critical Multiplier +1 Critical Threat Range Cooldown: 15 seconds Bear Form Melee Attack: Charge forward and attack, knocking enemies down. A successful Balance check negates the knockdown. Trip DC vs Balance: 10 + Druid Level + Max(Str, Wis) mod + Trip bonuses.

DC.Name: Nature's Protector: Bear Charge
DC.Description: Bear Form Melee Attack: Charge forward and attack, knocking enemies down. A successful Balance check negates the knockdown.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Lightning Strikes the Mountain
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +30% Damage Cooldown: 30 seconds Bear form Melee Attack: Activate to call down a bolt of lightning. On Hit: Lightning strikes, dealing 5 - 8 Electric damage per character level, scales with melee power. You are also granted a 100% bonus to melee threat and 20 Magical Resistance Rating for 15 seconds. Bonuses are doubled if Nature's Protector stance is active.

Stance.Name: Lightning Strikes the Mountain
Stance.Description: You are also granted a 100% bonus to melee threat and 20 MRR for 15 seconds. Bonuses are doubled if Nature's Protector stance is active.

Effect.DisplayName: Nature's Protector: Lightning Strikes the Mountain (with Nature's Defense)
Nature's Protector: Lightning Strikes the Mountain (with Nature's Defense)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Greater Nature's Defense III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose the final stance not chosen at tiers 1 and 2, between: Ursa's Heart, Ursa's Spirit and Ursa's Will.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[15/20/25]% competence bonus to max hit points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Spirit
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield/medium/heavy armor equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[2/4/6] competence bonus to Constitution.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ursa's Will
EnhancementSelection.Description: Requires bear form and a shield/medium/heavy armor equipped: Nature's Defense now grants you a +[3/6/9] sacred bonus to MRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Protector: Force of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain [10/15/20]% resistance against Force damage and +[1/2/3] Constitution. Your attunement to Nature is emboldened - Your Druidic Oath is no longer broken by wearing metal armor or shields.
